data.name: Nova Tales
data.detailed_description:
Nova Tales is a PvP Game where players can compete against each other through strategic battles upon the battlefield in a turn based fashion, using the best mechanics from the age old game of Chess itself along with the collectability of Trading Card Games paired with synergetic abilities.

Use your units to fight together chaining their abilities to make masterful strategic moves to devastate your opponent.


Features


* Mix and Match Units from different factions to build your ultimate Army.

* Utilizing each unit's ability to create masterful strategies.

* With tactically brilliant strategies , Take down your foes.

* Equipping your deck with masterful strategies and powerful synergetic Units.

* Multiplayer Battles to find the best of the best!


About Us



Enfused Games is an Independent Game Developer Studio from Australia.
As a solo Developer I like to make games that even I would play.
Within Nova Tales I want to bring out the strategic minds of many.
Most of all we just want to see people enjoy our game.
